name: Baldi's Basics - Field Trip demo: Camping REMASTERED.
name_original: Baldi's Basics - Field Trip demo: Camping REMASTERED.
description: Go new but alike camping with Baldi, again! Go to camp in Baldi, again, but with new strength, small portions of new things, and a lot of everything! The next updates may include more amount of content, bug fixes and even more! Just for a quick note, that this is not official. (of course, its not!) In this field trip, you go camping with Baldi. Your goal is to keep the fire alive for three minutes. Extra fuel gets converted into big points! Higher scores will get you better rewards! Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to turn. Left click to pick up firewood and fuel the fire. Hold down shift to run (Keep an eye on your stamina bar!), and press space bar to quickly look behind you. Escape can be used to pause, and "A" can be held while paused for about a second to quit to menu at any time. Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning belongs to Basically, Games! (www.basicallygames.com) Baldi's 3D Model belongs to SplintaDinta. (https://twitter.com/Saintza4) Fangame made by badrum. (https://twitter.com/badrum_me)
